ENGLISH DESCRIPTION
The Elimination Diet is the ultimate book on the field; it offers a proven method that will promote a long-lasting and fast healing method based on 3 phases which will detox your body. There is an age-old relationship between what you eat and how you feel. Just as no two bodies are the same, no two diets work the same for everyone. The only way to discover your ideal diet is to follow an elimination diet that will help you associate symptoms to foods that would at times be thought of as harmless but have been silently hurting you. Internationally known, elimination diets are heavily recommended by doctors and health experts.
